text.title: Abhaneri
text.head: Abhaneri
text.p: Abhaneri is a village in Rajasthan.
text.head: Get in
text.p: From Jaipur, catch a bus to Sikandra (₹20, 1 and a half hours), and then hire a jeep for the 10 km ride to Abhaneri (est. ₹250 return).
text.head: Get around
See

list.item: Chand Baori. Abhaneri is known for having this amazing step-well, which is 20m deep and has roughly 11 levels of steps.

Harshat Mata Temple. A temple belonging to the 9th century. The four-armed deity Harasiddhi is locally called Harshat Mata. A fair (mela) is held near the temple in the month of Chaitra (March–April) every year.
